      • matches

        public Boolean matches(Event e)
        Test if event matches rule
        Parameters:
        e - Event to match against rule
        Returns:
        True if event matches

      • except

        public EventFilterRule except(EventFilterRule r)
        Install negation rules for this filter rule

        Even if the filter rule matches, if the event also matches anything in the negation list it will not match the rule.

        Parameters:
        r - EventFilterRule to add to negation list
        Returns:
        EventFilterRule for chaining

      • setExceptRules

        public void setExceptRules(ArrayList<EventFilterRule> erules)
        Set except rules
        Parameters:
        erules - List of EventFilterRule for exceptions

      • wantStackdriverProject

        public EventFilterRule wantStackdriverProject(String project)
        Add match criteria for Stackdriver project

        If this rule is installed, an event will only match if it is an event from Stackdriver and the project matches the supplied argument.

        Parameters:
        project - Project name to match against
        Returns:
        EventFilterRule for chaining

      • getWantStackdriverProject

        public String getWantStackdriverProject()
        Get want Stackdriver project value
        Returns:
        Stackdrive project string, or null if unset

      • wantStackdriverLabel

        public EventFilterRule wantStackdriverLabel(String key,
                                            String value)
        Add match criteria for a Stackdriver label

        If this rule is installed, an event will only match if it is an event from Stackdriver and has a label with the specified key and value.

        Parameters:
        key - Label key
        value - Label value
        Returns:
        EventFilterRule for chaining

      • setWantStackdriverLabels

        public void setWantStackdriverLabels(Map<String,String> labels)
        Set Stackdriver label filters
        Parameters:
        labels - Map of key/value pairs

      • getWantStackdriverLabels

        public Map<String,String> getWantStackdriverLabels()
        Get Stackdriver label filters
        Returns:
        Map of key/value pairs
